item.description:
Heighten your senses, especially of smell and taste, Dining in the Dark places feather-weight blindfold on you which you wear while you're surprised with a four-course set menu, featuring the best of warm winter cuisine with a grand chocolate finish. Dining in the Dark has become all the rage in the Big Apple, and now this gustatory sensory adventure has come to Harvard Square as part of its Winter Carnival Chocolate Weekend. Menu remains a secret until it arrives at the table.

YOU MUST CALL TO MAKE YOUR OWN RESERVATION AT (617) 864-1933

$60 (not including alcoholic beverage, tax and gratuity) I plan to spend a maximum total of $100

If you would like to be seated together please meet at 6:15 PM in the Zebra Room and ask for Tonya/Meetup or call or text me 617 445 7549
item.why:
Dining in the Dark – Heighten Your Experience of UpStairs’ Winter Cuisine $60 (not including alcoholic beverage, tax and gratuity)
YOU MUST CALL TO MAKE YOUR OWN RESERVATION AT (617) 864-1933

item.name: Dining in the Dark at Upstairs on the Square in Harvard Square
